segments.text: I see the woman facing away from the room, at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate, rubbing it gently with the towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs unchecked, filling the sink too high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflowing water drenches the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She steps in the puddle without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the children plot their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy perches on the unsteady stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His arm is deep in the jar, pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, eyes wide with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the danger of the tipping stool worries me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the slippery floor adds to the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy yard outside mocks the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
